item.title: Windows Terminal Config
item.description: { "$help": "https://aka.ms/terminal-documentation", "$schema": "https://aka.ms/terminal-profiles-schema", "actions": [ { "command": { "action": "copy", "singleLine": false }, "keys": "ctrl+c" }, { "command": "paste", "keys": "ctrl+v" }, { "command": { "action": "splitPane", "split": "right" }, "keys": "ctrl+alt+right" }, { "command": "find", "keys": "ctrl+shift+f" }, { "command": "unbound", "keys": "alt+shift+plus" }, { "command": "unbound", "keys": "alt+shift+minus" }, { "command": "unbound", "keys": "shift+z" }, { "command": "unbound", "keys": "alt+z" }, { "command": { "action": "splitPane", "split": "auto", "splitMode": "duplicate" }, "keys": "alt+shift+d" }, { "command": { "action": "splitPane", "split": "down" }, "keys": "ctrl+alt+down" }, { "command": "togglePaneZoom", "keys": "ctrl+alt+up" } ], "copyFormatting": "none", "copyOnSelect": false, "defaultProfile": "{46ca431a-3a87-5fb3-83cd-11ececc031d2}", "profiles": { "defaults": { "font": { "face": "JetBrainsMonoMedium Nerd Font" } }, "list": [ { "colorScheme": "One Half Dark", "commandline": "%SystemRoot%\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.
